alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 11:53PM CST until February 22 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Southeastern Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1245 AM CST. * At 1153 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Howe to 4 miles south of Heavener to 3 miles south of Big Cedar, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Wister... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Midland... Heavener Runestone State Park... Big Cedar... Lake Wister State Park... Patterson... Arkola... Crossroads... Witcherville... Dayton... Hodgen... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
